3 int main(int argc, char** argv)
4 {
5  ros::init(argc, argv, "TX2_unicornStatemachine");
6  StateMachine state_machine;
7  int exit_code = state_machine.start();
8  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN] State machine exited with: %d", exit_code);
9  return 0;
10 }

12 StateMachine::StateMachine() : move_base_clt_("move_base", true)
13 {
14  bool run_global_loc, sim_time;
15  std::string odom_topic;
16  /*Extract params specified in the launch file*/
17  if (!n_.getParam("use_sim_time", sim_time))
18  {
19  sim_time = false;
20  }
21  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] sim_time: %i", sim_time);
22 
23  if (!n_.getParam("max_angular_vel", max_angular_vel_))
24  {
25  max_angular_vel_ = 0.5;
26  }
27  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] MAX_ANGULAR_VEL: %f", max_angular_vel_);
28  if (!n_.getParam("max_linear_vel", max_linear_vel_))
29  {
30  max_linear_vel_ = 0.3;
31  }
32  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] MAX_LINEAR_VEL: %f", max_linear_vel_);
33  if (!n_.getParam("odometry_topic", odom_topic))
34  {
35  odom_topic = "odom";
36  }
37  if (!n_.getParam("frame_id", frame_id_))
38  {
39  frame_id_ = "base_link";
40  }
41 
42  if(!n_.getParam("global_local", run_global_loc))
43  {
44  run_global_loc = false;
45  }
46  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Robot frame_id: %s", frame_id_.c_str());
47  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Listening to %s", odom_topic.c_str());
48 
49  /*Setup ROS subscribers and publishers*/
50  state_pub_ = n_.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/TX2_unicorn_state", 0);
51  amcl_global_clt_ = n_.serviceClient<std_srvs::Empty>("/global_localization");
52  cmd_vel_pub_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/unicorn/cmd_vel", 0);
53  odom_sub_ = n_.subscribe(odom_topic.c_str(), 0, &StateMachine::odomCallback, this);
54  acc_cmd_srv_ = n_.advertiseService("cmd_charlie", &StateMachine::accGoalServer, this);
55  cmd_sub_ = n_.subscribe(command_topic_, 0, &StateMachine::cmdCallback, this);
56 
57  /*Init global localisation if param is set*/
58  if (run_global_loc)
59  {
60  initGlobalLocalisation();
61  }
62 
63  /*Create pid controller for x movement*/
64  velocity_pid_ = new PidController(0.3, 0.1, 0.0, 0.05);
65  velocity_pid_->setLimit(-0.3, 0.3);
66 
67  /*Refuse bin location*/
68  refuse_bin_pose_.x = 0;
69  refuse_bin_pose_.y = 0;
70  refuse_bin_pose_.yaw = 0;
71 
72  /*Set the current state to be IDLE*/
73  Command initial_cmd;
74  initial_cmd.state = STATE_REVERSING;
75  current_state_ = StateFactory::CreateStateInstance(initial_cmd, n_, refuse_bin_pose_);
76 }
77 
78 StateMachine::~StateMachine() {}
79 
80 int StateMachine::start()
81 {
82  Command new_cmd;
83  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Starting state machine...");
84  while (ros::ok())
85  {
86  updateAndPublishState(current_state_->state_identifier_);
87  new_cmd = current_state_->run();
88  current_state_.reset();
89  current_state_ = StateFactory::CreateStateInstance(new_cmd, n_, refuse_bin_pose_);
90  }
91  return 1;
92 }
93 
94 void StateMachine::initGlobalLocalisation()
95 {
96  std_srvs::Empty srv;
97  ros::service::waitForService("/global_localization", 1);
98 
99  if (amcl_global_clt_.call(srv))
100  {
101  ROS_INFO("[AM Unicorn Interface]: Initialized amcl global localization");
102  }
103  else
104  {
105  ROS_ERROR("[AM Unicorn Interface]: Failed to initialize amcl global localization");
106  }
107 }

109 void StateMachine::cmdCallback(const unicorn::command &msg)
110 {
111  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn State Machine]: New command has been received");
112  Command new_cmd;
113 
114  new_cmd.state = msg.state;
115  new_cmd.param1 = msg.param1;
116  new_cmd.param2 = msg.param2;
117  new_cmd.param3 = msg.param3;
118  current_state_->setNewCmd(new_cmd);
119  return;
120 }
121 
122 void StateMachine::odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry &msg)
123 {
124  tf::Pose pose;
125  tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose.pose, pose);
126  current_yaw_ = tf::getYaw(pose.getRotation());
127  current_vel_ = msg.twist.twist.linear.x;
128  return;
129 }

131 void StateMachine::updateAndPublishState(int new_state)
132 {
133  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Updating state to: %s", getStateString().c_str());
134  std_msgs::Int32 new_state_msg;
135  new_state_msg.data = new_state;
136  state_pub_.publish(new_state_msg);
137  return;
138 }
139 
140 int StateMachine::sendGoal(const float x, const float y, const float yaw)
141 {
142  int attempts = 0;
143  try
144  {
145  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(x);
146  }
147  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &e)
148  {
149  ROS_INFO("%s", e.what());
150  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] x is undefined");
151  updateAndPublishState(STATE_IDLE);
152  return -1;
153  }
154  try
155  {
156  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(y);
157  }
158  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
159  {
160  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] y is undefined");
161  updateAndPublishState(STATE_IDLE);
162  return -1;
163  }
164  try
165  {
166  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(yaw);
167  }
168  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
169  {
170  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] yaw is undefined");
171  updateAndPublishState(STATE_IDLE);
172 
173  return -1;
174  }
175  while (!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)) && (attempts < 4))
176  {
177  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
178  attempts++;
179  }
180  if(attempts == 3)
181  {
182  ROS_WARN("Failed to contact move base server after four attempts, goal not published!");
183  return -1;
184  }
185 
186  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
187  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
188  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
189  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = x;
190  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = y;
191  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
192 
193  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
194 
195  return 1;
196 }
197 
198 std::string StateMachine::getStateString()
199 {
200  switch (current_state_->state_identifier_)
201  {
202  case STATE_NAVIGATING:
203  return "NAVIGATING";
204 
205  case STATE_IDLE:
206  return "IDLE";
207 
208  case STATE_LIFT:
209  return "LIFT";
210 
211  case STATE_REVERSING:
212  return "REVERSING";
213 
214  case STATE_ALIGNING:
215  return "ALIGNING";
216 
217  default:
218  return "INVALID STATE";
219  }
220 }
221 
222 bool StateMachine::accGoalServer(unicorn::CharlieCmd::Request &req, unicorn::CharlieCmd::Response &res)
223 {
224  if (current_state_->state_identifier_ == STATE_IDLE)
225  {
226  res.response = 0;
227  return false;
228  }
229  if (sendGoal(req.goal.x, req.goal.y, req.goal.theta))
230  {
231  res.response = 1;
232  }
233  else
234  {
235  res.response = 0;
236  }
237 }
